Add-on to BoaTester supporting selenium based test of web applications.

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =

Selenium: http://seleniumhq.org/ is grown-up and well known framework for testing web applications. During my work with that framework I came to the conclusion that test steps written as sequence of python statement is not good idea and decided to run a simple extension to selenium which replaces this part of test with simple text file.
